about.longDescription1: My name is Joao, I'm a Self-taught Software Developer who specializes in web development. The number one quality I like to tell everyone that comes across my profile is that I'm passionate about learning. Learning for me has never been just about working, but all that I do and appreaciate in life.
about.longDescription2: Over these past few years I've put all my effort into collecting knowledge and improving my skills towards creating highly functional cool-looking websites.
